project.name: ICS Library Management
project.description: V1.33 (24/03/2019) add geting last date of repeating event V1.32 (17/03/2019) add support for repeat until to date finder V1.31 (09/06/2018) add daylight time flag to DateValue V1.30 (15/04/2018) fix bug in add method of DateObject, lost timezone V1.29 (02/04/2018) upgrade date finder to cope with week numbers V1.28 (10/03/2018) add support for child events V1.27 add support for lines with multiple ":"s V1.26 add new constructor to DateValue V1.25 added difference methods to DateObject V1.24 fix problems with timezones in DateObject not being used correctly V1.23 remove utc from DateObject equals and add "addHours" method to DateValue V1.22 set DateObject utc flag if time zone is UTC V1.21 add date stamp method to events. V1.20 extend duration builder to handle illegal format created by Android V1.19 handle merging multiple DateList objects, with multiple EXDATE lines V1.18 handle unknown field types, normally starting "X-***" V1.17 fixed import of Google calendars that use space continuation V1.16 fixed NP issue with event fields, when generating compound values V1.15 added new TimeZoneProver interface V1.14 added new add method to DateValue V1.13 added support for timezone conversion in DateValue V1.12 minor updates to value fields + full Duration support V1.1 adds support for timezones
